review: This is great to use to cast from your phone tablet or other devices for quick viewing. Only takes minutes to set up. Will worth the money!
author: Nat McLaurin

review: Decent, but locks up some times
author: Mike

review: I can no longer imagine my home without ChromeCast.  Its changed the way we experience entertainment.  Id gladly pay double for what Chromecast has given us.
author: Shane Mirkovich

review: This thing is AMAZING. Love it. Seller got it to our house in record time too.
author: MMiller

review: Works well with netflix and not so well with amazon prime. You can play youtube and some other video sites.I like to use this mostly with netflix which really works great.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Chromecast is a great way to watch all your favorite shows in HD without having to worry about battery loss I'm your phone!
author: Jason

review: Great product, works like a charm...happy customer
author: Greg Ramirez

review: It works!  I can watch TV/Movies on my TV instead of on my iphone, woo!Just a side note, there's a little light on it so if you have it in the bedroom you might want to put tape over the light or something if you like perfect darkness while you slumber.
author: Daedalus1080
